1: @@//rdzogs pa gsang ba'i mtsho skyes la//bcu drug cha gang de nor bu'i//pad+mar rdo rje'i rtse mor gnas//de steng 'pho ba'i dus su 'gyur //nag po'i tshes gcig 'ongs pa na//
2: 'dod chags bral bas gnama stong la// nyi ma mdzod spu'i gnas su 'gro //de yi cha shes bcu drug ma//gtcug tor pad+mar son pa'o // zla ba nyams pa zhes brjod de//chags pa'i bde la
3: chags bral phyir//lus can thams cad 'chi ba na//zla ba bdud rtsi 'og tu 'gro//steng du nyi ma rdul sgra gcan//rnam shes dngos po'i mtshan nyid la// de phyir zla ba bdud rtsi ni//steng du bgrod bya
4: mi yi bdag /'og tu nyi ma rdul sgra gcan// rnam shes 'gyur mid bde ba la//sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod spu yi //pad+mar zla ba bdud rtsi ni//nyi rdul gnam stong gsang bar ste// gtsug tor
5: nor bur de dag go//zhes pa ston pa'i rdo rje'i chog /lus can kun gyi phyin ci log /rab gnas mya nan 'das pa min//khams rnams phyin ci log tu 'gyur// nor bur thugs dang gsang bar
6: gsung/lte bar sku ste bde chen las//chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa//'di rnams dag pa'i skru las spro // thabs kyi 'og tu rgyal po'i dbang//shes rab kyi ni steng du 'gyur //'di
7: yi dpral bar ku rdo rjo//mgrin snying lte ba'i 'dam skyes la//gsung thugs ye shes rdo rje rnams//sprul pa la sogs 'di rnams spro // phung po khams rnams spro ba ni // sgrib pa med pa'i
8: bde ba las//las kyi phyag rgya'i snyoms 'jug dang/ye shes phyag rgya'i da migs pa dang//pyag rgya chen po gcig sbyor bas//mi 'gyur bde 'phel bar 'gyur //'phel ba'i 'phel bar
